Career Objective:- 
            Intend to build a career with corporate of hi-tech environment with Committed &
            dedicated people, which will help me to explore myself fully  and realize 
            my potential. Willing to work as a key player in challenging & creative environment  
            as a team member.  Ideal candidate for position requiring drive, initiative, responsibility 
and challenge.
Personal information  :-
 
               NAME:                                    KRISHANU SEN

             Work Experience: -
1.6 Years in High Rise Building and Bridge projects From 11 January
2011 to 18 December 2016 as Electrical & Instrumentation Engineer
in  Samay Construction Pvt. Ltd.
2.2 Years in Electrical Project Engineering division from 20 
December 2016 to till date in Dattatreya Constructions Pvt. 
Ltd.
Technical Skills :- 
1) Research, develops, designs, and tests electrical components, equipment, and   
systems, applying principles techniques of electrical engineering, Design & directs 
engineering personnel in fabrication of test control apparatus and equipment and 
determines methods, procedures and conditions for testing products. 
2) Direct activities to make sure that manufacturing, construction, installation, and 
operational testing to functional specifications customer requirements.
3)  Direct and coordinate operation, maintenance, and repair of equipment systems 
in field installations.
4) Specialize in specific area of discipline, electrical energy generation, 
transmission, and distribution systems; products, appliances, generators, 
transformers, control devices,   manufacturing, applications or installation.
5) Use computer-assisted engineering and design software equipment to perform 
engineering tasks.
Professional Qualifications :- BACHELOR OF ENGINEERING in  APPLIED
